headline: Ameren Announces Pricing of Senior Notes due 2035
summary: Ameren Corporation (NYSE: AEE) announced today the pricing of a public offering of $750 million aggregate principal amount of 5.375% senior notes due 2035 at 99.822% of their principal amount. The transaction is expected to close on March 7, 2025, subject to the satisfaction of customary closing conditions.
